group_1.narration: The venue for the lecture is right here where we are now,@the Memory Museum.
There I saw Touka, whom I had been looking for for so long,@and I, who had no idea what was going on, was filled with excitement,@thinking that I might be able to ask her about Ui.
However, she told me that she didn't remember me,@and that she was one of the Magius.
It made me sad, because even though Touka could be a little snobby,@she wasn't the kind of girl who would do such a bad thing.
And so, in our tracing of Mifuyu's memories@at the Memory Museum, we were informed...
About Magical Girls, about Witches,@and about the true nature of the Doppel that I once unleashed...
Something so cruel and inescapable@that it diminishes the sorrow I have felt up until now,
"[textRed:the truth about Magical Girls]"...
When I woke up, Tsuruno and the others were gone;@only Yachiyo was there in their place.
I was relieved for a moment knowing that I wasn't alone,@but then Yachiyo told me that she was disbanding the team.
I didn't understand what was happening so suddenly,@but I couldn't imagine Yachiyo throwing us out for no reason.
So I thought someone must have told her something,@or she must have been mistaken.
After listening to Yachiyo's story,@I realized that she apparently believed that everyone would die@because of her wish.
Unconvinced, I decided to prove otherwise.
And then, to find Tsuruno and the others who had disappeared.
...Now that I think about it,@I wonder just how stubborn I was being.
Still, it's proof of how much I treasured Yachiyoãƒ¼@how much I treasured my friends.
But...
I ended up leaving Yachiyo on her own.
Even though I just promised her I wouldn't die.
Instead of hurting her,@I was doing what I thought would be best for Yachiyo,@as she's saved my life before.
And yet, I made her suffer from the fear I've felt myself,
the fear...that I might just lose everyone,
that fear, which Yachiyo always carried,@of losing her friends due to her wish.
It was only a little later that I realized this.
